name: Bot Fishing
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 40 in under 48 hours

Theme: The more you have, the worse it is

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/bot-fishing

Description

Capture and sell fish to earn money. The more fish you have on your boat the higher the risk it will sink. Rogue waves further increase the threat of sinking your boat.

Buy boat upgrades to increase its fish capacity and stability.

Controls

Control the boat with WASD or arrow keys

Cast your line and reel it in with left click.

Credits
Code and art by pseudokai and voxelv

Developed with Unity 2017
